page.title: 16Littlecote House
page.content: was Chinese exept for the carpet which came from the Palace of Versailles.Then the guide lead us into the library. The library had more than 2,000 books in it.The lady then told us that there was a secret passage leading to another room.We walked down a hall and we came to........................... {"The Dutch Parlour" The Dutch Parlour had{paintings}all over the wall.It was quite hard to detect the door once it had been closed.The reason why there are paintings on the walls is because when the prisoners of Holland were imprisoned in England they had nothing to do.So they just painted things on the walls.Then we went to the room next door it is called {"The Brick Hall". The Brick Hall is made of ashwood and
